original_title: Historia de una aurora y dos ocasos
overview: Oaxaca, October 29th, 2006. The Federal Police advances to take the city that has been in the hands of the popular insurgency for four months. Kresta and Anaclara, young supporters of the revolt, have been asked to pick up a radio transmitter that will supply the flimsy radio station of the movement.
title: Story Of A Dawn And Two Sunsets
